words.source: H559 (אמר), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'And/Moreover God said'.
H5750 (עוֹד), HD (adverb). KJV 'moreover', ESV 'also', NASB 'furthermore'.
H430 (אֱלֹהִים), HNcmpa (noun-common-mp-absolute). KJV 'God', ESV 'God', NASB 'God'. All agree.
H413 (אֶל), HR (preposition). KJV 'unto', ESV 'to', NASB 'to'.
H4872 (מֹשֶׁה), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Moses'.
H3541 (כֹּה), HD (adverb). KJV 'Thus', ESV 'Say this', NASB 'Thus'.
H559 (אמר), HVqi2ms (Qal-imperfect-2ms). KJV 'shalt thou say', ESV 'say', NASB 'you shall say'.
H413 (אֶל), HR (preposition). KJV 'unto', ESV 'to', NASB 'to'.
H1121 (בֵּן), HNcmpc (noun-common-mp-construct). KJV 'children of', ESV 'people of', NASB 'sons of'.
H3478 (יִשְׂרָאֵל), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Israel'.
H3068 (יְהוָה), HNp (proper noun, the divine name). KJV 'The LORD', ESV 'The LORD', NASB 'The LORD'. The Tetragrammaton.
H430 (אֱלֹהִים), HNcmpc (noun-common-mp-construct). KJV 'God of', ESV 'God of', NASB 'God of'.
H1 (אָב), HNcmpc/Sp2mp (noun-common-mp-construct/suffix-2mp). KJV 'your fathers', ESV 'your fathers', NASB 'your fathers'.
H430 (אֱלֹהִים), HNcmpc (noun-common-mp-construct). KJV 'the God of', ESV 'the God of', NASB 'the God of'.
H85 (אַבְרָהָם), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Abraham'.
H430 (אֱלֹהִים), HNcmpc (noun-common-mp-construct). KJV 'the God of', ESV 'the God of', NASB 'the God of'.
H3327 (יִצְחָק), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Isaac'.
H430 (אֱלֹהִים), HC/Ncmpc (conjunctive/noun-common-mp-construct). KJV 'and the God of', ESV 'and the God of', NASB 'and the God of'.
H3290 (יַעֲקֹב), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Jacob'.
H7971 (שׁלח), HVqp3ms/Sp1cs (Qal-perfect-3ms/suffix-1cs). KJV 'hath sent me', ESV 'has sent me', NASB 'has sent me'.
H413 (אֶל), HR/Sp2mp (preposition/suffix-2mp). KJV 'unto you', ESV 'to you', NASB 'to you'.
H2088 (זֶה), HPdxms (demonstrative-pronoun-ms). KJV 'this is', ESV 'This is', NASB 'This is'.
H8034 (שֵׁם), HNcmsc/Sp1cs (noun-common-ms-construct/suffix-1cs). KJV 'my name', ESV 'my name', NASB 'My name'.
H5769 (עוֹלָם), HR/Ncmsa (preposition-lamed/noun-common-ms-absolute). KJV 'for ever', ESV 'forever', NASB 'forever'.
H2088 (זֶה), HC/Pdxms (conjunctive/demonstrative-ms). KJV 'and this is', ESV 'and this', NASB 'and this is'.
H2143 (זֵכֶר), HNcmsc/Sp1cs (noun-common-ms-construct/suffix-1cs). KJV 'my memorial', ESV 'my memorial name', NASB 'My memorial-name'.
H1755 (דּוֹר), HR/Ncmsa (preposition-lamed/noun-common-ms-absolute). KJV 'unto all generations', ESV 'throughout all generations', NASB 'to all generations'.
H1755 (דּוֹר), HNcmsa (noun-common-ms-absolute). Repetition 'generation generation' = 'from generation to generation'. KJV, ESV, NASB all convey the idiomatic meaning.
